# 计算思维导论 Introduction to Computational Thinking

## What is introduction to computational thinking

《计算思维导论》是借助计算机解决问题的过程，用计算机的方式解决问题并表达其解决方案，有效地贯彻执行。

ITCT is the process of solving problems with the help of computers, solving problems and expressing their solutions in a computerized manner and follow through effectively.

它包括许多特征，比如把问题分解成小而重复的有序步骤，逻辑排列和分析数据并创建解决方案，这样可以使算法在计算机上有效的运行。

It include many features like breaking down the problems into small, repetitive ordered steps,logically arranging and analyzing the data and creating a solution so that algorithm can be made to work effectively on the computer.

计算机之所以能实现自动连续运算，是由于采用了存储程序原理。

How computer can realize automatic continuous operation,The reason is due to the principle of stored program.

数据被存起来，用到的时候CPU会用来自动计算

That is we stored many commands and data in a certain order into the memory, when working, the CPU will take these out and calculate automatically.

## How do I learn

1. the story of 0 and 1

   It is said that a European preacher introduced some thoughts about yin-yang to the scientists, then they give a birth to the 0 and 1.

   Nowadays 0 and 1 is the basic of computers.In this lesson, we learn how to use 0 and 1 to do addition, abstraction, multiply, and division.

   ![二进制乘法- JokerJason - 博客园](https://gss0.baidu.com/-vo3dSag_xI4khGko9WTAnF6hhy/zhidao/pic/item/6f061d950a7b02088edc2b446ed9f2d3572cc87a.jpg)

   ![二进制除法_二进制的除法运算-CSDN博客](data:image/jpeg;base64,)

2. 递归 recursion

   是指在函数的定义中使用函数自身的方法。

   And we learn the thoughts of recursion,is the use of a function's own method in the definition of a function.

​		The famous example is that the Fibonacci sequnce/ˌfɪbəˈnɑːtʃi/.

​		Its definition is like Fn = Fn-1 + Fn-2 which is very for us to understand it.

​		A number is the sum of its two preceding numbers.

3. 算法思想 algorithmic thinking

   Well, to solve mathematic problems in the computer,we need to nurture our algorithmic thinking.

   It mainly talked about the data structure and how to compute the spatio-temporal complexity.So teacher intorduced some structures like stack,queue,vector,tree,map

   stack and queue is two similary structure.The main difference is that queue is first in first out, stack is first in last out.We can use stack to design a calculators beacuse it is used like the storage system in the computer.we can use queue to manage the 任务排队问题 Task queuing issues such as we need to distribute the enough resource to the main task.

4. 冯诺依曼结构 von Neumann structure

![冯诺依曼体系结构- 李子恒- 博客园](https://img2018.cnblogs.com/i-beta/1489371/202002/1489371-20200205122018370-1525459707.png)

Von Neumann structure was used for over 70 years.Its main great contributions are that we mentioned above.First,he used binary number to run the computer which is proved very useful nowadays. another great thing he did is that he was the first man mentioned the storage system which i mentioned above too.the storage system make computer alive and it can calculate automatically.
